Extra​ ​Concierge​ ​Services

To ensure that all your travel needs are taken care of, we provide additional airport concierge services:

  • Home
  • / ​ ​Services

Visa assistance 

Details

  • We offer visa assistance round the clock to help our clients with their international trip. The service must be booked along with one of our Meet and Assist Service.

Porter Services 

Details

  • Assistance for your baggage is provided, by offering dedicated porter services, which is included in all our arrival and departure meet and assist packages.

Tarmac Transfer

Details

  • Inter-terminal airside private transfers and tarmac transfers from the aircraft can be provided with prior booking. This is part of our VIP/CIP meet and assist services.

Personal Security Services  

Details

  • Our client’s safety and privacy are of utmost importance to us. Thus, we also offer confidential, expert, and reliable Personal Security Services.
